message:
The IVI tv legal ruling just got handed down yesterday  though they’ve already said they’re going to appeal so who knows how this will turn out……

Legal Reprimand: Web Video Distributor Ivi Is Not 'Cable System': Granting a request by TV broadcasters 
- http://bit.ly/gTJa59 

Anyone here interested in chatting about how they think this one is going to turn out?
sure, I think there should be alternatives to cable... but I'm not sure they're going about it the right way
